channel.title: The Drunk Fist
channel.description: The drunk fist is my progress from a drunken developer into a full time carer who has stopped smoking, stopped drinking and started to take up boxing, muay thai, bjj, mma and generally just trying to be better.

item.title: The drunk fist website
item.description:
So, this is a new seperate website to my very code and technology heavy bloger hosted site. Most content will be on the various social media links below but some long form blog posts may appear here.

  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Instagram

Cheers!
